ygData.subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Newbie and solo questions
ygData.msgSnippet: **dusts off the robes he hasn t worn in two+ years of a 60 wizard ** Well, Let me think...I don t remember the spell names exactly, but always have shields up!
ygData.messageBody:
**dusts off the robes he hasn't worn in two+ years of
a 60 wizard **

Well,

Let me think...I don't remember the spell names
exactly, but always have shields up! Buy the AGATE or
upper level hit absorber spell reagents for your
shields...use them ALWAYS in solo efforts. SNARE,
SNARE, SNARE. Use youre snare spells and slow them
down and nuke away. If you do not have Jboots...get
them...they will make or break you as a solo artist.

I was there in the days when we first started to
Quad-Kite spectres in Oasis and then I quad-kited
wyverns in velious. Sure, you don't always win, but
once you get good at your technique you will win 9 out
of 10 easily.

Also, always have an escape plan. Set your limits
of damage or mana when you always will hastily
RUNAWAY!

Good Luck,

Ziffnab

60th Wizard of Xegony (retired)

--- MTS <rhythair@...> wrote:
> Um, hi everyone *waves*. I just joined the group
> and thought I'd say
> hi. My main is a wizard (obviously), though he's
> only mid-level. I
> mostly play characters over on the E. Marr server.
>
> I have a couple of questions though. Is it normal
> for wizards to die
> about every five encounters? I have a definite
> tendency to get
> killed. Also, anything that cons over light blue is
> almost
> impossible for me to solo. Is this normal, or do I
> need to rethink
> my strategies? I am having a lot of trouble finding
> a group since
> LDON came out, so this is a pretty important
> question for me.
>
> Sorry for the lame questions, but the only other
> wizard I know is
> even lower level than I am, so we aren't much help
> to each other info
> wise.
>
> Siriln Starfire of Felwithe
> 33 wizard of the Legion of Kithicor
>
> Cayrri of Halas
> 9 warrior
>
> Liriina of Neriak
> 4 rogue of Bristlebane
>
>
